forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain ending overnight. Low 51F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 15C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 59F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 46F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low around 45F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 57F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 44F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 42F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.
